titles.title: Lord, Prepare Me To Be A Sanctuary

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, prepare me to be a sanctuary,
Pure and holy, tried and true.
And, with thanksgiving,
I'll be a living sanctuary for You.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's You, Lord, that knows my weakness.
But, in You, I am made strong.
When I fulfill Your purpose,
In Your sovereign plan I belong.
